mapper.select: SELECT e.equipment_id, e.name, e.purpose, e.comments ,e.status,e.company_id FROM equipment e WHERE is_deleted='0' and (company_id = #{company_id} or #{company_id} = 0) ORDER BY equipment_id ASC LIMIT ${pageVo.startOffset}, ${pageVo.pageSize}

SELECT e.equipment_id, e.name, e.purpose, e.comments ,e.status,e.company_id FROM equipment e WHERE equipment_id=#{equipment_id} AND is_deleted='0' and (company_id = #{company_id} or #{company_id} = 0)
SELECT m.equipment_id, m.name, m.purpose, m.comments,m.status,m.company_id FROM equipment m WHERE m.name=#{name} AND is_deleted='0'and (company_id = #{company_id} or #{company_id} = 0)
SELECT count(*) FROM equipment e WHERE e.name=#{name} AND e.purpose=#{purpose} AND is_deleted='0' and (company_id = #{company_id} or #{company_id} = 0)
SELECT count(*) FROM equipment WHERE is_deleted='0'
SELECT max(equipment_id) FROM equipment WHERE is_deleted='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment(equipment_id, equipment.name, purpose, comments, equipment.status, is_deleted, created_time, created_by, modified_time, modified_by,company_id) VALUE(#{insertEquipmentVo.equipment_id}, #{insertEquipmentVo.name}, #{insertEquipmentVo.purpose}, #{insertEquipmentVo.comments}, #{insertEquipmentVo.status}, '0', #{insertEquipmentVo.created_time}, #{insertEquipmentVo.operator_id}, #{insertEquipmentVo.created_time}, #{insertEquipmentVo.operator_id},#{insertEquipmentVo.company_id})
